title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Surgical Clinical Education Design Using Remote Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Students can analyze patient conditions and develop appropriate treatment plans in virtual surgery scenarios
Students can improve non-technical skills (NTS) such as teamwork and communication in non-face-to-face environments
Students can strengthen clinical reasoning skills applicable to real-world clinical situations through simulation-based learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
